name: BNNSOptimizerAdamFields
desc: A structure that contains the fields of an Adam optimizer.

items.name: init(learning_rate: Float, beta1: Float, beta2: Float, time_step: Float, epsilon: Float, gradient_scale: Float, regularization_scale: Float, clip_gradients: Bool, clip_gradients_min: Float, clip_gradients_max: Float, regularization_func: BNNSOptimizerRegularizationFunction)
items.desc: Returns a new Adam optimizer fields structure from the specified parameters.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Returns a new Adam optimizer fields structure.

items.name: var learning_rate: Float
items.desc: A value that specifies the learning rate.

items.name: var beta1: Float
items.desc: A value that specifies the first moment constant in the range 0 to 1.

items.name: var beta2: Float
items.desc: A value that specifies the second moment constant in the range 0 to 1.

items.name: var time_step: Float
items.desc: A value that represents the optimizer’s current time and you’re responsible for updating after optimizing all the layer parameters in your network.

items.name: var epsilon: Float
items.desc: An addition for the division in the parameter update stage.

items.name: var gradient_scale: Float
items.desc: A value that specifies the gradient scaling factor.

items.name: var regularization_scale: Float
items.desc: A value that specifies the regularization scaling factor.

items.name: var clip_gradients: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether to clip the gradient between minimum and maximum values.

items.name: var clip_gradients_min: Float
items.desc: The values for the minimum gradient.

items.name: var clip_gradients_max: Float
items.desc: The values for the maximum gradient.

items.name: var regularization_func: BNNSOptimizerRegularizationFunction
items.desc: The variable that specifies the regularization function.
